page.title: 06High Density Population
page.content: It is only the extreme West of the area which has high density population the Shotgate part of Wickford.Battles- -bridge and Rawreth villages are the only other population centres.Other housing is mainly scattered and detached,though there are a few isolated terraces.Shotgate is a recent development containing a variety of houses from 2 to 4 bedrooms.All have to conform to the Essex Guild of house design and are for purchase not rent. Prices are from Â£30,000 upward.Rawreth and Battlesbridge have a variety of house styles from cottages to large detached houses in their own grounds. Both have a row of council houses.Most houses are farm houses and some e.g. Rawreth Hall must be classified as mansions.There are traces of the plotland development from the start of the century;several now modernised.
